SOMETHING_WRONG: Something went wrong. Please try again later
SERVER_ERROR: Internal server error. Please try again later
UNAUTHORIZED: You are not authorized to access this location
EMAIL_NOT_FOUND: Your email %email% not exists in our records
ACCOUNT_INACTIVE: Your login is bocked by admin
FORGOT_SUCCESS: Password reset instructions has been sent successfully
TOKEN_INACTIVE: Token is either expired or not valid
RESET_PASSWORD_ERROR: Unable to update password right now. Please try again
RESET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS: Your login password has been updated successfully
MISMATCHED_PASSWORD_ERROR: Password and confirm password not matched
GOAL_IN_USE: The goal you selected is being used by someone
CATEGORY_IN_USE: The category you selected is being used by someone
